processor.name: UpdateAccountSubscriptions
processor.condition: CREATE PROCEDURE condition @_ExecutePlugin BOOLEAN OUTPUT, @Operation ENUM -- $ICE:('metratech.com/GSMCreation','Operation')$ @ApplyAccountTemplate BOOLEAN, @b_cansubscribe BOOLEAN, @ActionType ENUM -- $ICE:('metratech.com/accountcreation','ActionType')$, AS IF ( (@Operation != #metratech.com/Operation/Add#) AND (@ApplyAccountTemplate = TRUE) AND (@b_cansubscribe = TRUE) AND ((upper(CAST(@ActionType AS VARCHAR)) = 'ACCOUNT') OR (upper(CAST(@ActionType AS VARCHAR)) = 'BOTH')) ) SET @_ExecutePlugin = TRUE ELSE SET @_ExecutePlugin = FALSE
